adrFormatAddress: 24, 3 World Financial Center, New York, NY 10281, USA

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of working with The Bostany Law Firm for trademark and copyright issues, and I must say, their level of expertise and professionalism surpassed all expectations. From the very first consultation, I knew I was in capable hands.

Their team of attorneys displayed an in-depth understanding of intellectual property laws and demonstrated remarkable attention to detail in assessing my case. John Bostany meticulously guided me through the entire process, making sure I fully understood the complexities involved and the potential outcomes.

What sets The Bostany Law Firm apart is their commitment to personalized service. They took the time to understand my business and its unique needs, tailoring their legal strategies accordingly. This level of dedication instilled great confidence in me as a client.

Throughout the proceedings, their communication was top-notch, promptly addressing any questions or concerns that arose. Their responsiveness and accessibility made the legal journey smooth and stress-free.

Moreover, their success rate is second to none. The Bostany Law firm secured a favorable outcome for my trademark and copyright matters, ensuring my brand and creative works were protected to the fullest extent.

I would wholeheartedly recommend  The Bostany Law Firm to any individual or business seeking expert guidance in trademark and copyright law. They have proven themselves as a trustworthy and reliable legal partner, and I am immensely grateful for their invaluable assistance.

Thank you, The Bostany Law Firm, for your exceptional service and for safeguarding my intellectual property rights!"

originalText.text: John Bostany protected my cosmetics brand and was very patient explaining the trademark issues.  Apparently names that are too basic don’t get approved so I went with a unique brand and I’m hopeful it will pass the Trademark Office review

text.text: John Bostany protected my cosmetics brand and was very patient explaining the trademark issues.  Apparently names that are too basic don’t get approved so I went with a unique brand and I’m hopeful it will pass the Trademark Office review

originalText.text: Top experience. John Bostany and his team communicated with my partners and I throughout our trademark case and we reached an extremely favorable settlement.

text.text: Top experience. John Bostany and his team communicated with my partners and I throughout our trademark case and we reached an extremely favorable settlement.

originalText.text: John protected my clothing designs by using copyright which I was unaware was used for the prints on the fabric.  I was grateful by how patiently he explained the process

text.text: John protected my clothing designs by using copyright which I was unaware was used for the prints on the fabric.  I was grateful by how patiently he explained the process

originalText.text: After meeting with many lawyers, we consulted John Bostany and his team for Trademark issues.   So grateful we did.  John’s hourly rate was higher, but he already had researched the issue that we were confronting, use in commerce.  John was able to prove our case for much less than the other firm was charging
